trans-unit.source: Format messages and post to Microsoft Teams.
trans-unit.target: Formatea los mensajes y envíalos a los equipos de Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: If the call to the Microsoft Teams webhook service fails, a TeamsWebhookException will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: If the call to the Microsoft Teams webhook service fails, a TeamsWebhookException will be thrown.

trans-unit.source: In order to test in your environment with pytest, set the environment variable MS_TEAMS_WEBHOOK to the Microsoft Teams Webhook url you would like to use.
trans-unit.target: In order to test in your environment with pytest, set the environment variable MS_TEAMS_WEBHOOK to the Microsoft Teams Webhook url you would like to use.

trans-unit.source: In some situations, a custom CA bundle must be used. This can be set on class initialization, by setting the verify parameter.
trans-unit.target: En algunas situaciones,se debe utilizar un paquete de CA personalizado.Esto puede ser establecido en la inicialización de la clase,mediante el ajuste del parámetro de verificación.

trans-unit.source: Preview your object
trans-unit.target: Previsualice su objeto

trans-unit.source: Python Wrapper Library to send requests to Microsoft Teams Webhooks. Microsoft refers to these messages as Connector Cards. A message can be sent with only the main Connector Card, or additional sections can be included into the message.
trans-unit.target: Biblioteca Python Wrapper para enviar solicitudes a los Webhooks de los equipos de Microsoft.Microsoft se refiere a estos mensajes como Tarjetas de Conexión.Se puede enviar un mensaje con sólo la Tarjeta de conexión principal,o se pueden incluir secciones adicionales en el mensaje.

trans-unit.source: Set Color Theme
trans-unit.target: Establecer el tema del color

trans-unit.source: Set to either the path of a custom CA bundle or False to disable.
trans-unit.target: Establezca la ruta de un paquete de CA personalizado o False para desactivarlo.

trans-unit.source: Testing
trans-unit.target: Prueba

trans-unit.source: The requests documentation can be referenced for full details: https://2.python-requests.org/en/master/user/advanced/#ssl-cert-verification
trans-unit.target: The requests documentation can be referenced for full details: https://2.python-requests.org/en/master/user/advanced/#ssl-cert-verification

trans-unit.source: Then, from the root of the repo, install the requirements and run pytest.
trans-unit.target: Entonces,desde la raíz del repo,instala los requisitos y ejecuta pytest.

trans-unit.source: This is a simple print command to view your connector card message object before sending.
trans-unit.target: Este es un simple comando de impresión para ver el objeto del mensaje de su tarjeta de conexión antes de enviarlo.

trans-unit.source: This is the simplest implementation of pymsteams. It will send a message to the teams webhook url with plain text in the message.
trans-unit.target: Esta es la implementación más simple de pymsteams.Enviará un mensaje a la url del webhook del equipo con texto simple en el mensaje.

trans-unit.source: This is useful in the event you need to post the same message to multiple rooms.
trans-unit.target: Esto es útil en caso de que necesite enviar el mismo mensaje a varias habitaciones.

trans-unit.source: This library uses Webhook Connectors for Microsoft Teams. Please visit the following Microsoft Documentation link for instructions on how to obtain the correct url for your Channel: https://dev.outlook.com/Connectors/GetStarted#creating-messages-through-office-365-connectors-in-microsoft-teams
trans-unit.target: This library uses Webhook Connectors for Microsoft Teams. Please visit the following Microsoft Documentation link for instructions on how to obtain the correct url for your Channel: https://dev.outlook.com/Connectors/GetStarted#creating-messages-through-office-365-connectors-in-microsoft-teams

trans-unit.source: This module is really just a nice wrapper pointed at the Microsoft API. To help troubleshoot missing messages, the requests response content is saved to the connectorcard class attribute last_http_status.
trans-unit.target: This module is really just a nice wrapper pointed at the Microsoft API. To help troubleshoot missing messages, the requests response content is saved to the connectorcard class attribute last_http_status .

trans-unit.source: This sets the theme color of the card. The parameter is expected to be a hex color code without the hash or the string red.
trans-unit.target: Esto establece el color del tema de la tarjeta.Se espera que el parámetro sea un código de color hexadecimal sin el hash o la cadena roja.

trans-unit.source: This will send two MS Teams messages describing how they are formatted. Manually validate that the message comes through as expected.
trans-unit.target: Esto enviará a dos equipos de MS mensajes describiendo cómo están formateados.Validar manualmente que el mensaje llegue como se esperaba.

trans-unit.source: To create a actions on which the user can interect with in MS Teams To find out more information on what actions can be used, please visit https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/platform/concepts/connectors/connectors-using#setting-up-a-custom-incoming-webhook
trans-unit.target: To create a actions on which the user can interect with in MS Teams To find out more information on what actions can be used, please visit https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/platform/concepts/connectors/connectors-using#setting-up-a-custom-incoming-webhook

trans-unit.target: También puede agregar varias secciones a un mensaje de la tarjeta de conexión.
